inn1.comm: good length and on off, clipped to Ajinkya Rahane at square leg
back of a length and around off again, Qdk flicks again, Rahane puts a diving save
drifting onto the pads, sticks in the pitch and stops on the batsman, who chips it in front of mid-on
back of a length and on off again, QdK jabs it away to the leg side off the inside half of the bat
Bhuvneshwar pulls his length back on a fourth-stump line, straight-bat punch back to the bowler
back of a length and swings in, Qdk pushes it in front of mid-on. Maiden
back of a length and jags in, Miller is cramped for room a bit but secures a single through square leg to get off the mark
full and outside off from round the wicket, QdK strides forward and plays a flowy drive between covers and mid-off, the outfield is pretty quick
pitched up and outside off again, driven back to the bowler, who stretches to his right and deflects the ball to mid-off
back of a length and angled in, Qdk jabs and dribbles it in front of mid-on off an inside edge
straight in line, solidly pushed down to mid-off
Mohit keeps it on a back of a length, this one comes in as QdK manages an inside edge onto the pad
back of a length and on middle, Miller invests in a neatly push, which whistles away in the space between mid-on and midwicket
angled in from round the wicket now to QdK, run away towards point off the outer half of the bat
QdK steps across off and targets the leg side and misses. Bhuvneshwar veers wide down leg. Called
tucked away off the pads to midwicket
QdK treks down the pitch as Bhuvnesh shortens his length. Pushed to mid-on for on
slanting down the leg side from over the stumps, another wide
nice and full on middle, Miller tips forward and taps it defensively down the ground
picked away off the pads through backward square leg. Just a single
good length and on middle, punchily struck in the space between midwicket and mid-on
on the pads again as Miller flicks and finds square leg
shortish and on off, glanced to the left of square leg with a whirl of the wrists
back of a length and slides in with the angle, clipped to midwicket
QdK dances out and nudges a single to leg, Dhawan fumbles briefly and gives away the single
crunchy! Back of a length and slanting away outside off, Miller stands tall and balanced as he punches it past mid-off
back of a length and outside off, QdK takes a step forward and eases three past the covers. He did not over-hit that, just placed it into the gap with a straight bat
short and lifts a bit on middle, turned to square leg
tight line and just a shade outside off, blocked towards cover
back of a length and outside off, another punch to mid-off. Miller is on his bike and races off for a quick one. Kohli ran in but did not collect the ball cleanly
QdK takes this back-of-a-length ball from outside off and jabs it to short midwicket
impressive, wristy work. QdK shuffles across off, picks up this length ball and dispatches it over backward square leg for a six
pitched up and outside off, may have been a offcutter Miller leans forward and pushes it to mid-off. QdK wanted a single but is sent back. He dives but Virat doesn't throw the stumps down
back of a length and outside off, twirled to square leg
shot! veering onto the pads, Miller sits back and plays a whippy punch past midwicket. The offcutter is put away
back of a length and on off, whirl of the wrists again as Miller finds midwicket
back of a length and sliding in, Miller can't connect with a flick and is rapped high on the pad. Mohit was appealing for something for the other..
disciplined line just a shade outside off, Miller drops it in front of mid-off
good length and outside off, QdK cracks a punchy drive and sends it skimming through the covers. Beautiful on-the-up drive...
full and angled in, QdK gets across and pushes it to mid-on
width outside off, QdK throws his bat at a cut, and finds backward point
back of a length and punched to the left of the bowler, towards mid-on. Harbhajan gets across and dives to stop the ball
nicely pitched up and outside off, Miller gets forward and taps it to mid-off
back of a length and just a shade outside off, punched crisply but straight to mid-on
tossed up and full, patted back
full and on middle, flicked to short midwicket
straight ball on middle, pushed past silly mid-off
nudged off the pads behind the square leg umpire for a jogged single
loopier and outside off, QdK stretches forward and laces it to wide long-off
pushed through on middle, Miller goes low and paddles it fine on the leg side. Not off the middle of the bat, though
dug in short and width outside off, QdK slashes it to cover
back of a length and driven gun-barrel straight down the ground. Nice straight bat and drilled for four
and that's an encore! Good length and on middle, he bends his knee and crunches it to the left of the bowler. Mid-on had no chance, again
dug in short and outside off, cut away behind point, towards Mishra at third man
length and outside off, pushed to mid-off
fractionally short and angled in, punched to Harbhajan at mid-on. The pair hare across for a single
Miller goes back and knocks this flattish ball to short midwicket
pushed through, non-turning ball, which is played back to the bowler
slides on quick on off, Miller latches onto it, cutting it between backward point and square cover. Perfect square-cut
dips in on middle, defended back to the bowler
darted outside off at 91ks, Miller camps back and punches a single to long-off
loopy on middle, drags QdK forward. He check-pushes it back to the bowler
pitching outside leg, helped to long-on
tossed up outside leg, hint of spin, off the pad
dropped short and width outside off, QdK rocks back and cuts it away firmly in front of square
sliding into the pads, the batsman nearly popped it to leg gully
flighted on off, blocked off the front foot
pushed through on middle, QdK hangs back and works it to short midwicket
skiddy ball, punched off the back foot to short midwicket
looped up on off, Miller plays for the turn and runs it away past slip off the outside edge
full and on middle, pushed back to the bowler
flighted on a leg-stump line, blocked to short midwicket
straight one outside off, driven smoothly to long-off
worked off the pads to short midwicket
darted outside off, Miller flashes a cut and the edge races away past Raina at slip
Mishra held this one back, defended to leg
tucked off the pads to the left of midwicket for one
QdK skips back to meet this flat ball and nurdles a single through midwicket
straight ball on middle, forward and played back to Mishra
tossed up and spins in a bit, defended back to the bowler
full and outside off, powered down to long-on
tossed up and Harbhajab gets spin, Miller misses a flick.. and takes it on the pad

Harbhajan strikes, Rahane pouches it at backward point. Harbhajan tosses this up generously outside off, some turn as well, Miller has a crack at it but his bat twists and he slices it off the outside half of the bat as Rahane moves to his right, tumbles forward to snaffle it. The strong opening stand has been broken. Who will come in at No.3?
flatter and on off, he hangs back and flicks it to short midwicket
slower and on off, Amla bends forward in defence
slides on, Amla pushes it down to long-on
tossed up nicely and spins away past the nervy prod. Drift, turn, and beaten
Mishra drags his length back a touch, this skiddy ball is worked off the back foot, past midwicket
picked away off the pads through backward square leg
pushed back to Mishra, who puts in a dive, and deflects it to mid-off
floated up on middle, blocked
straight ball from Mishra, Amla gets forward to smother it
pushed through and turns away, tapped to cover
full and outside off, forward push to cover
QdK dances out, meets the pitch and drives it along the carpet. Mohit runs to his right from long-off, drives and cuts it off
Harbhajan loops it up, defensively pushed to off
slides on outside off, cut away through backward point off the back foot
flattish and on off, QdK is on the walk as he pushes this one down the ground
spinning down leg, helped past leg-slip to long leg
pushed through on off as Amla responds with a wristy drive down to long-off
flighted on middle and leg, QdK stays back and defends it back to the bowler
tossed up on middle, eased to long-on
tossed up on off, another good-looking drive.. But this is intercepted. Jinxy the cat flings to his right from mid-off and shows off his reflexes
Mishra drags his length back, punched down to long-on and that's time for drinks
turns in on off with some extra bounce and foils Amla's attempted cut. Chopped in front of point
pushed through on middle, tucked to midwicket
Amla meets the pitch of this flighted-ball on off and drives it to long-off
QdK steps forward and drives it to short cover
full and straight on off, pushed back to the bowler
flatter and on the pads, jabbed to long-on
down the track and worked to midwicket
straighter ball on middle, Qdk ventures down the track, again. Whipped to leg

Dhoni takes the bails off in a flash. Amla can't drag his back foot back in time. The spinners have slowed the visitors down. Flatter at 94.6ks and spins away, Amla loses his balance as he aims to drive it through the off side. He does not connect, neither can he pull his back foot in time. The TV umpire is called in and Amla departs
looped up at 74ks, Faf bends low for a paddle and misses. The ball hits the grille of the helmet
flat and fired on middle, Faf goes back and whips it through midwicket
pitched up and on middle, QdK hits a drive to long-on
Faf comes down the track and nearly yorks himself, dug out in front of mid-on
Faf uses his feet again and clips a single to long-on
slides on middle, down the pitch and milked to long-on for one
darted outside off, chopped to point
full and on off, Faf comes down, meets the pitch and tucks it to cow corner
nice and full on middle, googly, pushed back to the bowler
worked off the hips to square leg
straight ball on middle, QdK makes a trip down the track and secures a single to long-on. He acknowledges his fifty and punches gloves with Faf
full and outside off, squeezed out between the bowler and short mid-off
QdK steps out again as the bowler pulls his length back. Punched down to long-on
nurdled off the pads to leg as Faf steps back
skiddy ball speared down leg, Faf moves outside leg. Wide
flatter in trajectory again, pushed back to the bowler
full and on middle, clipped to square leg, where Raina makes a diving save
Faf uses his feet, gets close to the pitch and milks a single to long-on
flighted and outside off, Qdk goes low for a slog-sweep but only drags it onto his back pad off an inside edge
Harbhajan gives this more air, the batsman nearly spoons it back to the bowler off a leading edge
Qdk breaks the shackles. He steps away outside leg and lofts it inside out over the covers. One-bounce four
flat and on middle, pushed to long-on
quick and outside off, QdK pierces the off-side field with a superb drive
tapped to mid-on
length and on off, bunted down the ground
darted on off, Faf goes back and punches it down to long-off
slides on outside off, QdK leans back and chops it to short third man
full ball on off, prodded into the covers
back of a length and angled in, punched to leg
back of a length and outside off, QdK throws his bat at a drive and mis-hits it to short cover
slippery bouncer outside off, QdK drops his wrists on it
back of a length and comes in, QdK responds with a jabbing punch down the ground, to the left of the bowler
short and ducks back into tuck QdK up for room. He targets a leg-side whip but no dice and he is hit on the body
flat ball, driven to short cover
fired outside off, crashed to short cover
extra bounce outside off, stops on the batsman, who goes back and almost chips a return catch
drifts in and defended back to the bowler
Patel pulls his length back outside off, Faf leans back and eases it to deep cover
straight ball on off, knocked to mid-on
Faf advances down the track and looks to drive. Off the inside off and hit to mid-on. Faf sets off, Kohli flings a direct hit at the bowlers' end. Faf comes back for the second
length and outside off, driven crisply to cover
back of a length and outside off, Faf gets on top of the bounce and punches it to the left of short cover, where Raina dives and makes a half-save. The sweeper cuts it off
back of a length and angled in, jabbed to short midwicket

Faf holes out to long-on. Kohli pulls off the finger-on-the-lip celebration.. Back-of-the-hand slower ball from Mohit, Faf steps out and aims a lofted strike. He is hoodwinked by the lack of pace on it. He can't manufacture his own pace either and miscues it to Kohli. Hang on, looks like Mohit has overstepped. His foot is on the line. No part of the heel behind  the crease.
short and outside off, QdK slashes, it does not carry to deep third man
back of a length and outside off, Faf keeps back. He looks to dab it down to third man but does not connect
clipped off the pads through backward square leg
pushed back to the bowler
flighted on off, Faf makes a hint of room outside leg and laces it inside out over extra cover. Long-off had no chance as well

Raina puts it down. Extra bounce and slides on outside off, Faf targets a leg-side flick but only spoons it in the air off a leading edge. Raina leaps off his feet, goes with his right hand but can't latch on. Another reprieve for Faf
diverted off the pad fine on the leg side
slid through quicker, drilled down the ground for one
fractionally short and outside off, punched to mid-off
back of the hand slower ball outside off, guided to backward point
slipper bouncer outside off, possibly off the back of the hand. QdK goes for a pull and top-edges it behind square
back of a length and on off, Faf camps back and whips it to deep midwicket
short and width outside off, QdK drops back and slashes a cut over backward point
back of a length and punched to long-on
straight one outside off, tapped down to long-on
slides on off, pushed down to long-off for another of those easy singles
another one bunted down the ground for one. South Africa are ticking along..
dragged from an off-stump line towards deep square leg
slog-swept away from outside off to square leg, where Kohli fumbles
Faf keeps back, meets this flat ball and punches it to long-on
pitched up and outside off, Faf uses his feet and drives a single to long-off
straight roller outside off, driven through the off side
down the pitch and twirled to midwicket
flat ball on middle, pushed to midwicket
Raina errs short, QdK rocks back for a pull and pulls it over midwicket. There is nobody in the deep, though
loopier on middle and leg, tapped down to long-on for one
full and on middle, tucked to midwicket
pushed through on off, worked to midwicket. Single pinched now
picked away off the pads through backward square leg
quicker and on off, Faf goes low to one knee, goes against the spin but middles a slog sweep over midwicket
arm-ball, snakes in with the angle, kept out
lovely wristwork from Faf. Tossed up on off, Faf ventures down the pitch and chips it over long-on.. One-bounce four
full and just a shade outside off, pushed to long-off
whipped to square leg from an off-stump line
full and on middle, eased down to long-on
slides on outside off, QdK rocks back and chops it to deep cover
down the track and chipped cleverly over midwicket
straight ball on the pads, hit down to long-on
picked away off the pads past midwicket
legbreak outside off, steered towards point off the back foot
slides on outside off, forced to cover
down the pitch and poked to midwicket off an inside edge
dragged short and outside off, cut to the covers off the back foot
eased off the pads to deep midwicket. QdK jogs off for one
short and angled in, pushed to leg for one
length and on middle, Faf shuffles across off and looks to lap it away. Off the back thigh and sneaks away fine on leg
dug in short and on off, Faf loads up for a pull and hits it to the deep midwicket boundary. It dipped onto short midwicket, where Dhawan dived forward but couldn't pouch it
back of a length and comes in, chopped onto the pitch
third fifty of the series for Faf. Good length and outside off, Faf ventures down the track and caresses a lofted drive over mid-off
might have been a googly, rips away as QdK pushes and misses
down the pitch and worked down to long-on for one
drifting down the leg side, tickled to short fine leg. Faf wants a single but is sent back
full on middle, dragged to deep midwicket with a slog sweep
clipped off the pads to midwicket
flat and fired on middle, jabbed to mid-off
Faf feigns away outside leg and the returning Harbhajan follows him. Milked to long-on
short and extra bounce outside off, chopped to short cover
looped up on middle, patted to the left of a diving bowler. He gets a hand to it and deflects it to mid-on
slides on outside off, forced in front of square with a cut
short and turning away, cracked to sweeper cover
full and straight, Faf bunts it to long-on
darted outside off, slapped to short cover, where Dhawan dives to his right and shells a tough chance
dropped short and outside off, cut past cover
pushed back to the bowler
straight roller on middle, driven to long-on
shortish and down leg, helped straight to short fine leg. Faf gets back after setting off, even as Dhoni cheekily deflects it back onto the stumps
skiddy ball at 97ks, Faf wants to slog-sweep it away but does not connect
length and on off, pushed to mid-off
angled onto the pads, whipped through midwicket
Faf runs down the track, Bhuvneshwar slows him down with a slower ball. Skewered in front of long-off
good length and swerves in a bit as Faf is cramped for room. Dragged past midwicket. QdK struggles to get through for one
jabs this back-of-a-length ball through square leg
darted down the leg side, wide called
back of a length and outside off, QdK does not time it well. Punched to mid-off
QdK brings up his fourth ODI ton in seven innings v India. He charges down the track and sends this slower length ball clattering past the covers
short and down leg, helped to long leg with a pull
full and outside off, Faf strides across and scoops it to the left of Dhoni

Faf looks to hit the repeat button, this time he finds short third man. Faf shuffles across off again, this time his balance is foiled and he topples over.. He skewers it in the air, popping a catch to short third man running back
good length and outside off, AB goes hard on a drive and mis-hits it to mid-off
slid short and outside off, cut away off the back foot to backward point
quicker and on the stumps, pushed to mid-on
darted outside off, QdK uses his feet, slugging it to long-on
hurrying ball on middle as AB steps out and misses the slog-sweep, taking it on his front pad. The spinner just fired it it in on seeing AB come down
AB into the action. Width outside off, he bends his back knee and spanks a drive through the covers

Dhawan, who had dropped a tough chance to let Faf off, makes amends by running QdK out. This was pushed through on an off-stump line, AB works it towards short midwicket, where Dhawan flings to his left and stops the ball. QdK was late to respond, as Dhawan throws ball over to Dhoni. QdK is caught short

Axar gets AB with an arm ball. Two wickets in two balls for India. Big, big wicket this. Arrows in, as AB goes back for a cut, he gets some bat on the attempted cut, chopping it towards point. The umpire Dar thinks it was pad first and raises his finger. Replays show that it was pad first indeed and hit in front of middle.
tossed up, pushed to mid-off
pushed back to the bowler
Flighted ball on middle, driven to long-off
fired flat and quick, driven past the bowler to long-off
full and dips on a fourth-stump line, pushed back to the bowler
punched down to long-on
picked away off the pads through midwicket
looped up and hint of turn outside off, nudged past cover for one
clipped off the pads to deep midwicket
hurrying ball outside off, too close to cut. Chopped back to the bowler
dangled up outside off, Duminy unfurls a reverse-paddle and sends it through the vacant-slip region
nudged off the pads behind square leg
flat and darted on off, Behardien stands tall and punches it down to long-on
flighted on middle and leg, knocked in front of midwicket for a single
loopier and outside off, pushed back as Axar dives to his left and makes a half save
another flat darted, hit down to long-on, where Mohit fumbles and allows two where there should have been one
slides on outside off, late-cut away to short third man
googly on middle, prodded to the leg side for one

Dhoni goes up for a caught-behind appeal. Drifting down leg as Mishra gives this more air, Duminy glances and misses. Not bat involved and the appeal is shot down. Ultra Edge, though, picks up a spike
darted outside off, chopped off the back foot to cover
tapped down to the leg side for one
short and spins away outside off, cut away through backward point
back of a length and darted outside off, Duminy goes hard on the cut and secures a single to cover
length and outside off, pushed to cover
pitched up and outside off, driven down to long-off
on the pads, helped through backward square leg
full and on middle, nudged behind square
full and quick on off, pushed to long-on
fractionally short on off as Behardien hangs back and defends it in front of mid-on
good length and on off, tapped to off
short and darts back in as Behardien looks to pull and mis-hits it to short midwicket
back of a length and on off as the batsman stands tall and punches a single to long-on

slanted down the leg side, off the pad and beats the keeper diving to his right. Dhoni can't pouch it and the umpire says that there was a snick involved and that will do down as another dropped chance
short and on off as Behardien is tucked up for room. He punches it to deep midwicket
Behardien skips out, Mohit drags his length back. Mishit back to the bowler

full and on middle and leg, swiped away behind square off the inside half of the bat. The two batsmen nearly bumped into each other during the second run but they complete the second, beating the throw from Kohli
short and on off, punched to sweeper cover for one
Duminy holes out to long-on. Full and on middle, right in the hitting zone. Duminy goes for a loft... Raina runs in, dives forward and snaps it up. Dhawan pats Raina on the back
back-of-the-hand slower ball outside off, the batsman is early into an attempted cut and misses..
slippery bouncer outside off, Behardien ducks under... Sails over to the keeper and wide called
shortish and jabbed to the left of a diving short midwicket. The batsman was tucked up for room..
keeps it short on off, worked towards long-on for one
back of a length and tails in, Steyn only gets an inside edge onto the pad
pretty full and aimed at off, Steyn's bottom hand comes off the bat as he meets the ball. Hacked past the covers
fractionally short and outside off, forced to deep cover
slower ball outside off, Steyn can't thrash it away.. Mishit to long-off
back of a length and slipping down leg, wild heave and a miss from Behardien
104.4ks slower ball, dragged behind square on the leg side off a thick inside edge
back of a length and on a leg-stump line, Behardien pulls behind square, Rohit runs to his right, slides and hauls the ball in before the boundary. Sharp work
Mohit pulls pace off another one. Forced away to sweeper cover
Steyn makes room outside leg but Mohit follows him with a yorker, Steyn jabs his bat down and gets an inside edge onto the pad
length ball on off, right in the slot. Steyn sizes it up and launches the back-of-the-hand cutter over long-on
short and on middle, Steyn manufactures room outside leg and slashes it to backward point
pretty full and on middle, pushed down to long-on
yorker at the base of off, jammed out to long-off. Steyn slips as he looks to turn back for the second
short on off, slogged to wide long-on
full and on middle, drilled ram-rod straight down the ground. Raina runs to his left from long-on, slides and deflects the ball to long-off
banged in short and hurries on, Behardien miscues a pull in front of long-on. The pair seek to hare across for the second but the throw from Raina is accurate and Steyn is run out
Bhuvneshwar serves up a juicy full toss on middle, clubbed away over deep midwicket as Behardien finishes it with a six

inn2.comm: 132 ks to start with, gentle outswing outside off, Rohit puts one front forward and skews a drive to point
a slightly shorter length, but full nonetheless. Outside off and swinging away and Rohit wants nothing to do with it
still swinging for Steyn. Full and wide outside off, Rohit shoulders arms once again
this one is closer to off, probably the fifth-stump line and Rohit comes forward to block to point
135.7 ks, full and wide and belted away through the off side for four. Exquisite timing, typical Rohit. He throws his hands at the ball to find the gap through point
goes wider with a hint of outswing. Left alone
good start. Fuller length aimed at the top of off. Solidly blocked off the back foot
140.8 ks, good length just outside off now, Dhawan hangs back and punches the ball to wide mid-off for a quick single
141.6 ks, good pace though. Good length outside off, climbing a tad on Rohit who leaves watchfully
overpitched now and Rohit creams a drive to cover. Wow, that sounded good but did not find the gap
nice stuff this. Back of a length just outside off, Rohit gets a good front stride to defend with intent
hustles Rohit for pace now. Hit a hard length outside off, Rohit thinks he can pull but the ball hits the bat before Rohit can play his pull. An awkward pull goes to cover
short and wide, flayed away off the back foot but straight to cover
well done, excellent cricket all-round. Slightly full by Steyn on middle and leg, Dhawan leans on a  drive to mid-off. Faf runs across and puts in a diving stop
that may have come in a tad. Rohit defends watchfully to mid-on
he finds the gap this time. Great timing again. Slightly full but wide and Rohit finds the gap through cover. Races away
better comeback. may have come in again. It is wider outside off though and Rohit leaves, AB dives low to his left ,but fumbles allowing the single
strays on Dhawan's pads this time who flicks to square leg
141.8 ks, overpitched on middle and leg, similar to the length of Rohit's dismissal last game but this time he turns to ball to square leg
again he just times the ball to the boundary. Not a great ball - full on middle and leg, Rohit just nudges the flick in the gap through midwicket. Beats the fielder for four.
another excellent looking shot. Cuts to point though
much fuller, bowls it closer to off also and Rohit blocks off the front foot
good length outside off, no swing at all. Left alone by Rohit.
142.5 kph, fuller on off, Rohit is watching the ball excellently here. He pushes the ball to mid-on off the front foot
picks the length early here does Dhawan, not that short but Dhawan pulls to square leg where there is a misfield. Allowing the one.
nicely bowled, from that height he delivers it on a fuller length outside off, not much movement and Rohit steers to third man
145 kph, hangs on the back foot again does Dhawan. Morkel pushes it slightly fuller than a good length and Dhawan drives to mid-off
these are pretty good lengths from Morkel. Top of middle length and Dhawan repeats the push to mid-off from the back foot
much much better. Discernibly full from Morkel and Dhawan meets it with a solid drive to mid-off
143.2 kph, well done by Dhawan. Steals the strike off Rohit this time. Full on off and Dhawan pushes the ball to Faf at mid-off with soft hands and sets off for a quick single. Makes it easily
dug in outside off, doesn't get up high enough but Dhawan stays in his line and watches it go by to the keeper
144 ks, not that full but Dhawan drives with good timing to cover
gets the gap this time and even with an ill-timed drive, it races off for four. Quality stroke. Full but on a fourth-stump line, Dhawan finds the gap through cover with his drive
nice from Dhawan. Not very nice from Rabada. Follows-up a full length delivery with a fuller length outside off, easily driven down the ground through mid-off
good comeback. Good length on off, cramping Dhawan for room. He stands tall in his crease and punches to mid-off
good finish! Back of a length on off and Dhawan respectfully blocks the ball back to the bowler
hits the back of a length but it is outside off, Rohit flat-bats a pull over square leg. Dragged that from outside off and the timing isn't exceptionally good either but just beats the fielder

almost run-out. What happened there? There was a single in that, but that wasn't good calling from rohit. Full and driven to mid0on, Steyn dives across and cuts it off. Rohit calls for one and then sends Dhawan back, the throw is not direct and Dhawan gets a let-off. Rohit's view may have been impeded by Morkel in his follow through
defended off the front foot
back of a length outside off. dabbed to third man for a single
inside-edged to the keeper. Fuller but wide, Dhawan goes to cut but chops it back towards AB
uppish but on the bounce to extra cover. Not that full outside off, Dhawan goes through with the shot but lands well short
short and on leg, rank long hop to start from JP. Pulled to square leg
dropped. Rohit, what have you done? Morkel drops a relatively simple catch at backward square leg. Drooped short by JP on leg, Rohit pulls to Morkel high and it burst through his hands
pushed with the spin to long-on
tossed up on leg, clipped to square leg
another drop. This one very hard though. Fuller on off, Dhawan gets a thick edge as he tries to defend. The deflection is quite big and AB spills it
overpitched on leg, driven to long-on
full on off, Dhawan drives back to Morkel
full again outside off, driven with bad timing to mid-off
not very wide but Dhawan flays at it, fuller than a good length. Goes past the outside edge
better from Dhawan. Just times the cut to point. Not very short but it is Morkel's height that is responsible for that bounce
very full outside off, square-driven out to point off the front foot
aah, some calmness. A maiden from Morkel. Too full outside off, Dhawan gets one front foot stride and drives to mid-off
drifts past Rohit's outside edge. Nicely bowled, slowed up through the air outside off
that is not very nicely bowled. Very full, well down leg. Rohit gets down early and sweeps through backward square
shortish outside off, punch-driven to cover
tossed up outside off, Rohit goes back and uppishly drives that to mid-off
fullish and tossed up, solidly blocked
turned away with the spin to square leg and the pair immediately decide there is a single. They make it easily
fullish outside off, Rohit presents a full face to block
may have been a slower bouncer. Dug in short aimed at Rohit's badge who takes his eyes off the ball as he pulls to fine leg
beauty! Impeccable line and length. Good length, just about missing the off stump. Dhawan too is beaten. May have moved away a touch.

taken this time! Pressure has built and built into a wicket. And both fielders responsible for the first two dropped chances combine to remove Dhawan. Good length again outside off, Dhawan advances and tries to drive through the off side but the ball may have moved away again just enough. Thick outside edge and well taken by AB diving to his left.
ooh, very full on middle but Kohli nudges the ball to midwicket for a single
slightly full outside off, Rohit drives delectably to mid-off
pushed through slightly quicker outside off, turned away to midwicket
well played. Overpitched but well outside off, Kohli swivels as he plays a drive to long-on
shorter on off, nudged to midwicket. Little bit of turn here
slower again on middle, Rohit finds the gap through midwicket for one
drifts on with the arm outside off, no turn but Virat goes back and pushes the ball towards cover
too short, Rohit waits for the ball to come to him before cutting late in the gap in front of third man. Deep point runs around and cuts it in
well timed from Kohli. Full on middle and leg but Kohli plays the ball in the gap through midwicket. Did not look to hit that too hard. All placement
this is quick and full, may have tailed back in a touch. Kohli, though, gets his bat down early to drive to mid-on. Quick single, easily made
back of a length outside off, Rohit hangs back and drives to cover.
137 ks, fuller, but Rohit doesn't pick that length. Almost sneaks through but Rohit gets bat down on it just in time. May have not hit off stump though
what a shot. Take a bow, Rohit! Picks the length very early and executes to perfection. Too full outside off, Rohit advances and smashes it over mid-off. Goes back a good distance too.
calmly opens the face of the bat to guide one to third man
flatter on middle, pushed out to midwicket
nicely flighted outside off, Rohit gets forward to tickle to midwicket
dips on Rohit who is through his shot early. Fuller outside off, Rohit squirts the ball to point
shot of the day. We have seen quite a few today but this one was special. A bit too full maybe but Kohli makes room and bottom-hands a  cover drive against the spin through extra cover. Special stuff
nudged with the spin to square leg
strays down leg, called wide

great finish. Goes wider off the crease and pitches it on a full length, Kohli is in two minds as to how to play that and eventually does neither. Is beaten and the ball hits his body before rolling away to third man
full outside off, blocked off the front foot
thick outside edge, no slip in place though. Fuller outside off, Kohli looks to drive but the ball goes all along the ground to third man who runs across and cuts that in
138 ks, overpitched on off, pushed to mid-on this time. Good stuff from Steyn, accurate!
fuller on middle, Kohli plays that awkwardly but it still looks good as he works the ball to deep square leg
wow, that looked good. Too full and Rohit leans into a drive to cover
excellent variation, 128 ks, slower delivery outside off. Rohit is beaten all ends up as he tries to cut into the off side.
ooh, drifts on with the arm again and beaten again. Kohli looks to pat the ball to point but goes through
no spin again. Flatter outside off, awkwardly played out to cover
tossed up outside off, clipped to midwicket
drifts down leg and called wide, free run

he plays the sweep, doesn't look very confident but he gets this to the boundary. Very close had he missed and he nearly missed. Overpitched on leg,and somehow VK gets some bat on it to the fine leg boundary
skewed back to the bowler against the spin
that is a much better option. Slower on leg, Kohli just tickles that fine past the wide short fine leg. Morkel runs that down very well and saves a run
aah, flighted delivery end sup a full toss, Kohli clears one foot but drives to cover
this one lands at a fuller length and Kohli plays that swivel-drive to long-off
flighted on off, defended watchfully
oops! Bad full toss on leg, Rohit just heaves the full toss over midwicket for an easy boundary
lands it nicely now. Much fuller on off, calmly defended
pushed to long-on against the spin.
back of a length on middle, defended off the back foot
very well played. Good bouncer, but doesn't get that high enough. Rohit arches his back and steers the ball to third man uppishly
sneaks past Kohli's inside edge. That may have come back in as Kohli tries to steer to third man
overpitched on middle, aiming for the quick yorker. But Kohli works the ball to fine leg
142 ks, pulled to deep square leg off the front foot. That was good pace but Rohit easily pulled that. Shows you the amount of time he has to play his strokes
144 ks, good length on middle, nudged away to midwicket
tossed up on middle, decent amount of turn. Defended watchfully
flighted again, too full though and drilled to long-off
worked away against the turn to square leg
pushed to long-on
too full again, these two picking off the ones here. Easily played to long-off with a drive
better length that. Much fuller but not too full. Played into the off side
fuller length outside off, Kohli chops the ball to third man for a single
143.3 ks, full and swinging back in a tad. Rohit squirts the ball to midwicket
too full again, easily clipped to deep square leg
too short and another easy single. Things all too easy for India at the moment. Kohli hangs back and dabs this to third man
143 kph, fuller length outside off, not much swing. Rohit pushes this to point off the front foot

there comes out an exuberant stroke. But terribly executed. Full again on middle, Rohit looks to stand and deliver, tries to go over the bowler with a powerful smash but the ball hurries onto him and skews to mid-on
slower thorugh the air but the line is a bit leg side-ish. Tickled away to square leg
googly on off, Kohli rocks back and punches to long-on for one
another googly. Rohit did not pick that. plays outside the line. The ball hits him on the pads but struck outside off
absolutely massive that. Huge huge six to bring up his fifty. He dances down the track and muscles the ball well over long-off, great shot.
a bit short, played to square leg
driven with the turn to long-on.
good ball. Very tight lines. Full and coming back into Rohit's pads. Almost creeps through but Rohit gets bat down in time
well steered, just waits for that ball to come to him before guiding the ball to third man.
inside edge now. A bit full outside off, Kohli looks for a gap to third man but a bit of inward movement takes the ball to his inside edge
high full toss on middle, Rohit doesn't try to heave it but instead pushes the ball past mid-on. Morkel chases that down well
low full toss, trying for a yorker again. Kohli bunts that to mid-on
slower offcutter, bouncer! Kohli stays back and keeps it out
low full toss, Rohit gets down early and sweeps the ball through square leg. Amla runs around from midwicket but the ball goes through
easily pushed to long-on. No trouble
almost sneaks through. Fuller and flatter, Kohli goes back instead of forward, keeps it out though
misfield from Amla. Worked away with soft hands to deep square, the misfield gives them an additional run
driven with the turn to long-off
slower through the air, clipped to midwicket

Rohit falls! Excellent improvisation there from JP. Sees Rohit coming down and bowls that a touch shorter. Rohit is left feeling for that and can only pat the ball back to JP who dives low and holds on to a good catch. He is pumped too.
shorter and flatter outside off, MS rocks back and muscles it back to JP.
short and quick, flat-batted to deep cover
too full, calmly pushed to long-on with the spin
too full again from JP. Flights that one right up, but Kohli can easily play that to long-on for an easy single
84 ks, that's better. lands it on a full length, not too full. Dhoni works the ball to square leg
Kohli looking in great touch now. Fuller ball on middle and leg, turned away off his pads to deep square leg
137.3 ks, full and straight, zoned in on Dhoni's pads, pushed out to mid-off
good running, full and angling in again, Dhoni pushes the ball to the right of mid-off and sets off for one
wonderful timing. Tails in to Kohli who flicks the ball uppishly, wide of square leg to the deep square leg fielder
change in type of delivery. He angles this one away from Dhoni who stays in his crease and just pushes the ball in the gap through point. Well played.
shorter delivery now on off, Dhoni gets both his feet off the ground and pats the ball to point
overpitched outside off, smashed out to deep cover
fullish again outside off, driven to cover
muscled to cover with lots of bottom-handed power. A touch short and smashed to cover
too short again, Dhoni hangs back and cuts to find the gap through point
flat and quick on leg, worked fine towards deep fine leg
darted in outside off, Dhoni just times the cut to deep point for a comfortable brace
very quick and full on off, squirted out to mid-off
good length on off, defended into the off side. the point fielder is quick on that
zoned in on Kohli's pads who flicks into the gap to deep midwicket
aah, strays in line now. Angled into Dhoni's pads but goes too fine as Dhoni just gets some bat on it to fine leg
shorter outside off, jabbed down to third man
good length outside off, Kohli gets behind the line of that to defend back to Steyn

out with a direct hit and that is not frequent with MS. Good length on off, defended into the off side and sets off immediately. He sprinted to the other end and apologises straightaway, he knew that was a bad call
shortish on middle and leg, worked away off his ribs to square leg
too leg side-ish, nudged off his hips to fine leg
good length, coming in, slapped to point
again a bit full, all these deliveries aimed at the pads. But the movement isn't prodigious. Dhoni drives to mid-off
136.4 ks, shortish outside off with a hint of tail. Left alone by Dhoni
113.8 ks, gentle delivery on middle, pushed down to long-on
again aimed in at Dhoni's pads who has no trouble in jabbing a drive to long-off
wider outside off, driven to deep cover for another single
good length on off, pushed out to cover off the front foot
overpitched, misfield, and almost a run-out. Other than that, a nothing delivery. Driven to cover where there is a fumble, there is some miscommunication but no harm
overpitched once again on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
short delivery on off, not getting high enough, but Kohli defends the back of a length delivery to point
leg side-ish again and Kohli tickles this one fine to fine leg
good length on a fourth-stump line, carved out to deep cover.
slower delivery, good variation. On middle and Kohli plays it with soft hands towards square leg. MS says there is no run there
beautifully played. Doesn't hit that, he times that. He finds the gap through mid-off. Morkel goes fuller this time and VK gets a front stride and leans this through mid-off
goes back to that good length, turned to midwicket
strays in line and Dhoni tickles that very fine for four. Just needed some bat on that and the ball races for four.
fuller length on middle, slapped to long-on
slower delivery outside off, carved out to cover.
tight from Fudge, fullish on middle, Kohli nurdles the ball to midwicket
full now but straight again, skewed off the inside half of the bat to deep square leg
116 ks, yorker outside off but no pace on that. Dug out by MS back to the bowler
flat and quick on leg, Kohli goes back quickly to defend
flat again, not much flight. Driven towards long-on, a massive diving effort from the midwicket fielder to stop that but can't
overpitched on off, dug out to the bowler
comes down the track and coverts the flight into  a yorker, pushed to cover
another dot ball as Dhoni tamely pats the ball into the off side
what a ripper. Unplayable that. Slower through the air, may have been the first slower one in the over. That one pitches on off and turns away to deep Dhoni's outside edge. Wow, great to watch
too full and straying on Kohli's pads who flicks the ball to deep square leg for another single. All too easy for VK.
better from Rabada and some more miscommunication from these two. Good length on off, Dhoni pushes the ball towards cover and looks for a single but Kohli sends him back, looked like a single was on.
fuller angling in, to middle. Played with the angle to midwicket
again full on off, no room at all. Pushed out to mid-off
139.2 ks, full but not a half-volley. Muscled out to AB at wide mid-off
excellent finish. Tight over. Just one off that. He gets high off his toes and pats the ball towards point
49 for Kohli, driven to long-on. Too full, giving Kohli an easy run
skips down the track, smothers the spin and works the ball to long-on for another run
flat and pushed back to the bowler
flat again, darted in on off. Kept out by VK
and there is the much-awaited moment, fifty for Kohli. Well played. Calmly pushes the googly towards cover and gets the single
slightly wide and short. Dhoni goes for the cut and misses. Tahir is excited but no bat.
short delivery on Kohli's ribs, almost kisses his glove too as he tries to flick. He isn't unhappy with the call but that isnt a wide
good delivery on off, patted out to point
142.3 ks, full on off, Kohli drives back to the bowler with a full face
hustles Kohli for pace who flicks late to mid-on. Rather full that
banged in short and gets Dhoni hopping now. He plays the ball out to square leg awkwardly
drifts in line now and Dhoni lets the ball go, called wide down the leg side
almost bunts the ball to point. Short and wide, Dhoni plays a nothing shot and eventually gets the ball wide of point for a single
nicely tossed up, extracting a bit of turn. Dhoni dances down the track and almost gets beaten. Pads it back to the bowler
dances down the track and clips to long-on
too short on leg, Kohli swivel-pulls to backward square
drilled to long-on
beautiful flight outside off, somehow Dhoni gets to the pitch and drives to long-off
googly on off and middle, played back down the track watchfully
good improvisation from Morkel and Dhoni. MS advances at MM, but Morkel pulls his length back and Dhoni improvises well too to muscle to cover
worked nicely off his pads to deep fine leg. The ball goes towards backward square and they get two
140.5 kph, on leg and clipped to square leg straight to the fielder
just wide of square leg. Uppishly fliced just wide of that square leg fielder. Swinging back in and Kohli flicks again, Tahir at fine leg misfields giving them another
angling in to middle, pushed out to midwicket
shorter on off, Kohli swivel-pulls down to fine leg, got onto that length very quickly
short and wide, smashed out to point where there is a misfield, giving them a single
good variation in length now, lands it on that length where M doesn't know whether to go back or front. Powered to cover
drilled to long-on now again
googly on off and middle, turned away with the spin to midwicket
some more flight, Kohli gets down early and looks to sweep. He just doesn't look at home with that shot. the ball bounces extra and hits him high on the body
slightly full on off, Dhoni looks to go for a heave back over Morkel's head but the ball sneaks in a touch, and takes Dhoni's inside edge
slower delivery on a good length outside off, slapped to cover
looking for another boundary, short on middle, Kohli pulls uppishly wide of the backward square leg fielder to deep square leg. Looking for the boundaries now
good length again, hitting that hard length and the line is pretty good - on middle. Dhoni works the ball to midwicket
133.9 ks, short on off, Dhoni goes back and flat-bats a pull past midwicket for an important two
142.5 kph, almost catches it on his follow through does Morkel. Shortish on middle, Dhoni advances but the ball climbs and hits Dhoni's splice as looks to heave. Straight down the ground for one
short and flat outside off, Dhoni rocks back and muscles a pull back to JP who gets some hand on it but can't prevent the single
well bowled, delivered wider outside off as Kohli skips down and tries to belt the ball down the ground. Doesn't get close to the ball but hits to long-on

missed stumping. The bat goes flying to midwicket. Everything is happening now. Gets to the pitch but the ball creeps through and QdK doesn't see it either. The bat slipped out of Dhoni's hand probably due to the buckets of sweat
flat and wide outside off, Dhoni leaves. Close call but given wide
good bowling here. Not overly flat, just a bit of air on that. Dhoni comes down and hits the ball back to JP
too short but this time Dhoni was hanging back and powers the ball with lots of bottom hand through cover. Shades of the 2011 World Cup final

whoa! take cover, Dhoni is coming. Flighted outside off, Dhoni gets to the pitch and absolutely belts that with all his might back at the unprotected bowler who spills the ball, straight back at his midrift that was. Dangerous. It'd be quite amazing if  he hasn't hurt himself
angling in on leg on a good length, Kohli looks to go over midwicket but takes the inside-edge instead
another dot. Follows the backing-away Kohli who can only find the fielder at midwicket as the ball hits his glove
back of a length on middle, nudged off to fine leg
excellent stuff this. Nothing these two quality batsmen can do. Good length again on middle at good pace, Dhoni keeps the ball out with a tickle to square leg
back of a length but this time just wide outside off, bunted out to cover for one
139.6 ks, what an over that. the pressure builds.Slightly fuller on leg and Kohli is through his attempted swipe. The inside edge rolls to point
flat-batted to mid-off. Conscious effort not to bowl anything full. Short of a length on off, Dhoni skips down but can only find the fielder
and again, back of a length on middle. Dhoni heaves this one to deep midwicket for one
short on off, Kohli picks this one up early and uppishly pulls to deep midwicket again

falls short of the fielder. This time the ball goes for four. Short again on middle, Dhoni flat-bats it but doesn't get all of it, the ball lands just short of Behardien at long-on and the ball goes through

gone! What a wicket, huge huge stuff. Short ball outside off, Dhoni looks to dab that over short third man but the ball lobs up to Steyn at short third man. takes an easy catch and this match gets interesting
good length on leg, Raina clips his first ball to square leg
another dot. Full and angling in on leg, Kohli looks to swipe to leg but is hit on the thigh pad again
another swipe to leg which is missed. Tailing in to Kohli who is struck on the thigh pad, the ball looks destined for the boundary but Qdk makes a good diving stop

slower ball on middle and leg, Kohli works the ball towards deep fine leg and scampers back for the second. He dives full-length but has he made his ground? The bat looks on the line but have the bails been dislodged? Looks very very close. Quinton de Kock takes the bails out immediately. Benefit of doubt maybe? Big big call. Given not out. India get the extra run too. The fielder was Imran Tahir
what a response that is. Good length and he gives himself room and smashes the drive through the vacant cover region. More face of the bat presents more opportunity
picks the midwicket fielder. Short again on leg, Kohli pulls nicely but straight to that man
114.5 ks, slower ball down leg. Called wide
short on middle, worked to fine leg to keep strike
reverse-swept for four. What a shot Kohli. Who said he was out of form? Flatter on off, he connects beautifully and finds the gap through backward point
clever from Kohli. Pushes this one to long-on for a single. Hits Raina's bat on the follow through but they take the single

taken! Not a great shot from Raine with Kohli going strong from the other end. Googly outside off, Raina looks to drive over the man at long-off but doesn't get all of it. Lands down Miller's throat at long-off. A single would have been a good result but he wanted more. One crucial moment lost by Raina and India
darted in on leg, worked off his legs to fine leg
short outside off, Rahane gets a good single as he plays fine late cut for one

a better throw would have had him! Another big moment in this match. Flat on middle, Kohli works this towards midwicket and comes back for the second. The fielder fumbles and returns a slow throw and Kohli is fit enough to get back for two easily
given wide, iffy call. Rahane shuffles across and tries to help that to fine leg and the ball goes close to leg stump.
beats Rahane's outside edge as he looks to steer to third man. Fullish length outside off and Rahane wants to give Kohli the strike but can't connect
just short of Miller and he fields that too. Good fielding. Good length on middle and Rahane pulls that on the bouce to midwicket. Good stuff
they steal the second. excellent running from Kohli. Rahane comes down the track and slogs the length delivery to long-on, Steyn is slow on that and Kohli scampers back, fit man
follows Rahane who back away looking to exploit the 4-5 field. Heaved away to deep midwicket
slipped out maybe. And that goes down the leg and high over Kohli's head. Just the one wide
143.7 kph, full again and following Kohli who also backs away. The ball goes through as he tries to swipe into the leg side. QdK fumbles while collecting, they get another run
lots happening here. Rahane shuffles across now and the ball is on a good length on middle, Rahane is struck high on the thigh pad. No run as QdK is quick on it

Morkel wins this moment. What a wicket this is. Is this the defining moment? Short on leg and Kohli can only heave the ball in the air to Miller at deep midwicket who takes a comfortable catch. This line, length and field placement has worked wonders so far. Stalled Kohli throughout the second part of his innings. Take a bow, Russell Domingo and AB de Villiers

repeat delivery. Repeat shot. Repeat dismissal. Miller takes this low to the ground, that being the only difference. Banged in short again, Rahane advances and slogs this in the air to deep midwicket. Are these percentage shots? With this consistent length, the batsmen have been found out playing poor shots.
on a hat-trick, and he will continue to be. Strays down leg and called wide
fullish length, worked out to midwicket
shorter length again, Harbhajan plays a punchy pull to deep midwicket
back of a length once again on off, inside-edged down to fine leg for a single
shortish length again, all Harbhajan can do is pull to deep midwicket
flat again on off, Axar skews the ball towards midwicket and they look for two but Bhajji sends him back
yorker, and a quick one too. bhajji squeezes this to cover. No run
nicely slowed up. Tossed up wider outside off, Harbhajan looks to clobber that down the ground but the heave is beaten
he'll get four now. Low full toss on leg, Harbhajan just helps the ball along its way to the boundary past fine leg

what was happened there? Stumped, bowled, caught? Googly on leg and Harbhajan is beaten as he tries to heave. QdK takes the bails out but Bhajji's feet are still inside the crease. Harbhajan thinks he is bowled and walks out of the crease but given not out on tv replays
good length on off, chopped back to the bowler
driven to deep cover
full on off, Bhajji looks for the big heave and a thick inside edge back on his body. They take the single, Steyn tries to run him out in his follow through but doesn't succeed
that length again. Good length on leg, heaved away to deep midwicket where Amla fumbles allowing the extra run
yorker outside off, good variation. Axar digs this one out to cover
full and wide outside off, carved out to deep cover on the bounce
141.1 kph, guess what? It is another back of a length delivery on leg which is followed by a massive heave to deep midwicket
144.6 kph, good length on middle, flat-batted to midwicket
back of a length on leg, Axar is struck on the body and rolls nowhere.
varying this well, full on middle, inside-edged to backward square leg for a quick brace
speared into the blockhole on middle, squeezed to long-on
yorker on middle, Axar drives to the bowler who fires back an inaccurate throw to QdK

Morkel makes a mess of another catch. Never looked like getting under that. Full outside off which is lobbed up in the air towards short third man. Morkel backtracks and advances and eventually the ball drops
good length, pulled to fine leg

what fielding. Deserved a wicket for that piece of fielding. Short on off, flat-batted to Miller at mid-off who dives to his right and makes an amazing stop. He then gets up and fires a throw to the non-striker's end and a direct hit would have had him.
low full toss, heaved away to deep square leg for two
full on off, driven to mid-off. Harbhajan ambles to the other end and AB throws at the non-strikers end but misses.

final one goes out of the ground. What a shot that is too. Good length on middle and Axar plays this straight over Steyn's head with a straight elbow. SA complete an amazing turnaround win to go 2-1 up in the series.
